# Tdp52 expression profiling constructs

This document contains information about constructs that will be used for rescue experiments in MG63.3 clones of the YBX1 GUC CRISPR experiment. All of the detailed constructs will be insert into a piggyBAC vector using Gibson assembly.

## Individual constructs

All of these constructs have been codon optimized using the [IDT tool](https://www.idtdna.com/CodonOpt) so they can be built as gBlocks. All constructs here have start and stop codons, so you will need to remove them depending on what type of fusion you want.

piggyBAC start

```
ccagaacacaggcaagtttgtacagctagccacc
```

piggyBAC end

```
ttcgaatgtacaaagtggtgatcctcaggt
```

TDP52 (ENSG00000076554, ENST00000448733.3, CCDS75757)

```

```

## Ordered constructs

Anytime there is a FLAG-ORF fusion, there is an 'L' linker between them. Any time there is an APEX2-ORF fusion, there is an 'LQ' linker. All constructs are assembled with an N-terminal NheI site, and a C-terminal BstBI site. All constructs have an N-terminal Kozak sequence.

piggyFwdRev_TPD52

```

```
qpcrTpd52Fwd1

```
ACCCGGATCACCTACTCTT
```

qpcrTpd52Rev1

```
CAGCAACATCTTCTCCTTCCT
```
